description:
Part A: Chio-chan is told by Yuki that the head of the Kabaddi Club, Kushitori, is missing.
Part B: Chio-chan spent way too much time playing video games yet again and turns her commute into an imaginary route from a game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trouver sa voie / L’esquive de Chio
それぞれの道 / エルードちおちゃん
